name: COIN GOBBLER: Advance
description:
a small game for mini jam 3, about gobbling up some coins

venture into the dark depths of coin hell and salvage as many coins as you can. but still, be careful with the disgusting slime! don't get trapped! eat coins!!!!!

might try to make an improved version of this at some point

edit: fixed a bug with the html5 version where you could get stunned forever by slime
